casebody.data:
Pierre CHASTENET and Another, Plaintiffs Appellees, v. MOUQUIN, Inc., Defendant Appellant. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. December 17, 1928. No. 118. Townsend & Kindleberger, of New York City (E. Crosby Kindleberger, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Evarts, Choate, Sherman & Leon, of New York City (Maurice Leon, of New York City, of counsel), for respondents.

Before L. HAND, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Appeal dismissed in open court.
